statements: SELECT * FROM device_location;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_location ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM device_location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT device_id, longitude FROM device_location WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_location ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM device_location WHERE device_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM device_location WHERE device_id = 20 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM device_location WHERE longitude > 50 AND latitude < 40
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM device_location WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM device_location WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-06-30 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location_lat > 0;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, event_type FROM device_history WHERE event_time > '2021-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE location_lat < 50;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE location_long > 100 ORDER BY location_long ASC;
SELECT dh.event_type, dh.event_time, d.device_name FROM device_history dh JOIN devices d ON dh.device_id = d.device_id WHERE dh.event_time >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY;
SELECT device_id, location_lat, location_long FROM devices WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY location_lat ASC, location_long DESC LIMIT 2;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM connected_devices WHERE location_lat > 40 AND location_long < -100;
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM connected_devices ORDER BY location_lat DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, provider FROM geolocation_services;
SELECT * FROM connected_devices WHERE location_lat > 0.0 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT id, device_name, location_lat FROM connected_devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY location_lat ASC;
SELECT users.username, geolocation_services.service_name FROM users JOIN geolocation_services ON users.user_id = geolocation_services.service_id WHERE users.email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT device_name, location_lat, location_long FROM connected_devices WHERE location_long BETWEEN -10.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location_lat, location_long FROM connected_devices ORDER BY location_lat DESC, location_long ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude, address FROM locations;
SELECT history_id, device_id, location_id, timestamp FROM device_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT status_id, device_id, status, timestamp FROM device_status WHERE status='active';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_location, last_update FROM devices ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Phone';
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM devices ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT devices.device_name, locations.address FROM devices JOIN device_history ON devices.device_id = device_history.device_id JOIN locations ON device_history.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT device_name, status, timestamp FROM devices JOIN device_status ON devices.device_id = device_status.device_id WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_locations;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, device_type FROM device_details WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, os_version FROM device_details WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT user_id, device_id, user_name FROM device_users WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM device_locations WHERE device_type = 'phone' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, manufacturer FROM device_details WHERE os_version >= 10;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_status FROM device_details WHERE device_status IN ('active', 'inactive') ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, location_id, last_visited FROM device_users JOIN user_locations ON device_users.user_id = user_locations.user_id WHERE location_id = 123456;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, last_updated FROM device_locations WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
